urbanDevelopment.title: Urban Development
urbanDevelopment.description: Urban planning attrs. An exclusive place designed to offer an excellent quality of life, tranquility and a natural environment, with internal roads that lead to a privileged view of the swamp, ideal for water sports and fishing.

strategicLocation.title: Strategic Location
strategicLocation.description: It is located on the variant of Cartagena, on the road that connects the cordiality of Turbaco, just 10 minutes from the city, 15 minutes from shopping centers such as Los Ejecutivos and 12 minutes from the Serena del Mar Hospital.

Payment.title: Payment Method
Payment.socialInterest: Apply with our social interest rates.
Payment.initialFeeValue: can be financed up to 10 days before delivery with no interest.
Payment.financing: Financing with our direct credit allies. Upon purchase of the lot, we deliver the plans and Renders with no architectural cost.

Policies.deliveryDescription: The lot is delivered when the last payment of the initial fee is paid and the purchase promise is signed. And we proceed with the purchase and sale protocol and we give you the plans and renders for your home at no cost. At this point, the client can start the procedures to start the construction of their home.
Policies.constructionDescription: The land transfer is done upon payment of the full value of the lot, that is, when you pay your credit. And we proceed with the deed of the property. The owner has the obligation to present a project with the construction plans to the board of directors and/or administration for their approval and to start the construction of their home within a term no longer than one year, once the urbanization works have been completed.
Policies.imageAlt: A large tree by the water

Services.title: Water, Electricity, and Gas Services
Services.description: The water service is supplied by Aguas de Cartagena, which guarantees its potability and constant supply. The OPERATOR OF THE CARIBBEAN NETWORK has its networks extended to our project, guaranteeing a high-quality energy service. The gas service has its main networks at the entrance of the project, which allows us to provide the corresponding connections to all our lots and common areas. We have our own wastewater treatment plant.
